questions.prompt: Choose the best sentence to complete the passage
choices: Occasionally, magnet fishers have discovered truly valuable antiques, though typically such objects are badly damaged after being submerged for many years.
Generally, the low cost of powerful magnets and strong rope makes magnet fishing a popular hobby among people from different economic backgrounds.
Sometimes, magnet fishing can be a life-long hobby, becoming a family tradition and lasting into a person's old age as the younger generation gets involved.
questions.beforeSelectTheBestSentence: Magnet fishing uses powerful magnets, plus a strong rope, to catch on to pieces of metal, such as iron, nickel, or steel submerged in water. Magnet fishers often work from a bridge or boat to see what they can discover. The thrill is the surprise factor. Usually, it's hard to know just what might be lying down below, especially if the water is deep or murky.
questions.afterSelectTheBestSentence: Still, most magnet fishers can collect some metal to sell as scrap. This is because old pieces of scrap metal can be sold to recyclers to convert into new products. But perhaps the best part is knowing magnet fishing helps people connect with nature in a different way.
